name: KALEIÇI - THE CHARM OF THE OLD TOWN
description:
Kaleici (Kaleiçi)i is a very special
place. It means 'inside the castle' and its original purpose was to surround
and protect the Roman harbour.  While the greater part of the present city
was built after World War II, the history of the old town dates back to ancient
times. After the Romans, the Byzantines took over the city; also the
Crusaders had it in their hands. Most of the historical landmarks date back to
the Seljuk and Ottoman era. It is a privilege to walk these narrow streets so
reach in history and beauty. It is one in a life experience to play tavla and
drink tea in small cafeterias and eat lunch in one of Antalya's oldest restaurants.
The old town is the heart of this city and is the place, where your love for
Antalya will begin...
